source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, causing an Upheveal at 100% effectiveness that does not knock enemies up. Casting Breath of Eons always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Your Upheavals have a 50% chance to grant Essence Burst. Eruptions cast with Essence Burst deal 25% increased damage.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gauntlets of the Chosen Dead

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 14,189 for 15 sec.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 409,431 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,660 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
